title: Markdown Sample
description: A simple markdown example with metadata.
author: John Doe
content:
Markdown Sample

This is a sample markdown document with metadata.

Features

  • Headers (#, ##, ###)

  • Bold & Italic (**bold**, *italic*)

  • Lists

    • Unordered list
    • With multiple levels

  • Ordered list

    1. First item
    2. Second item

  • Code blocks

    console.log('Hello, Markdown!');
